snippet: As the American military’s presence abroad shrinks, so too must the Pentagon’s budget. The question is whether we can be smart about it.
abstract: Editorial argues that as the American military presence abroad shrinks, so too must the Pentagon's budget; maintains the question facing the country is whether cuts to the military budget can be made intelligently.
